trans-unit.target: TEXT_BAHAMUTGUIDETRAVELWILD2_Q1_000_010<tab>What would you like to do?
TEXT_BAHAMUTGUIDETRAVELWILD2_A1_000_011<tab>Learn about the Final Coil of Bahamut.
TEXT_BAHAMUTGUIDETRAVELWILD2_A1_000_012<tab>Enter <var 40 ((<var 28 ((InstanceContent)) E80204 /var>)) /var>.
TEXT_BAHAMUTGUIDETRAVELWILD2_A1_100_012<tab>「<var 28 ((InstanceContent)) E80204 /var>」をGREED限定で開始
TEXT_BAHAMUTGUIDETRAVELWILD2_A1_101_012<tab>「<var 28 ((InstanceContent)) E80204 /var>」をマスタールートで開始
TEXT_BAHAMUTGUIDETRAVELWILD2_A1_000_013<tab>Nothing.

TEXT_BAHAMUTGUIDETRAVELWILD2_SYSTEM_000_050<tab>The Final Coil of Bahamut is comprised of multiple dungeons, or <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>turns<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>. Please be warned that the spell Return cannot be used in certain turns.
TEXT_BAHAMUTGUIDETRAVELWILD2_SYSTEM_000_051<tab>Progress within the Final Coil of Bahamut is saved at specific locations for each player, and you may resume your foray where you left off.

TEXT_BAHAMUTGUIDETRAVELWILD2_SYSTEM_000_052<tab>Progress is reset every <var 06 1203 /var><var 09 DD ((Sunday)) ((Monday)) ((Tuesday)) ((Wednesday)) ((Thursday)) ((Friday)) ((Saturday)) /var> at <var 08 DB ((<var 09 DB02030405060708090A0B0C0D02030405060708090A0B0C /var>)) 0D /var> <var 08 E0DB0D ((p.m.)) ((a.m.)) /var> (Earth time).
TEXT_BAHAMUTGUIDETRAVELWILD2_SYSTEM_000_053<tab>To enter the Final Coil of Bahamut, you must be in a party of eight Disciples of War or Magic with a level of 50 or higher.
TEXT_BAHAMUTGUIDETRAVELWILD2_SYSTEM_000_054<tab>All members must also have completed the quest “Fragments of Truth.”
TEXT_BAHAMUTGUIDETRAVELWILD2_SYSTEM_000_055<tab>The starting point is determined by the party leader's progress.
TEXT_BAHAMUTGUIDETRAVELWILD2_SYSTEM_000_056<tab>Even party members whose progress is different may participate, provided they meet the entry requirements.
TEXT_BAHAMUTGUIDETRAVELWILD2_SYSTEM_000_0561<tab>Those who have not advanced as far as the party leader will have their progress updated to be the same as that of the leader.
TEXT_BAHAMUTGUIDETRAVELWILD2_SYSTEM_000_057<tab>Those who have advanced further than the party leader, on the other hand, will retain their progress.

TEXT_BAHAMUTGUIDETRAVELWILD2_SYSTEM_100_057<tab>In this latter case, you will not receive rewards from dungeons that you have already completed, and the number of coffers that pop will be adjusted accordingly.
TEXT_BAHAMUTGUIDETRAVELWILD2_SYSTEM_000_058<tab>All forays into the Final Coil of Bahamut are limited to 90 minutes (Earth time).
TEXT_BAHAMUTGUIDETRAVELWILD2_SYSTEM_000_059<tab>All items in a player's loot list will automatically be transferred to that player's inventory upon all other party members leaving the area.
TEXT_BAHAMUTGUIDETRAVELWILD2_SYSTEM_000_060<tab>Items unable to be obtained will be lost.
TEXT_BAHAMUTGUIDETRAVELWILD2_Q2_000_100<tab>Enter <var 40 ((<var 28 ((InstanceContent)) E80204 /var>)) /var>?
TEXT_BAHAMUTGUIDETRAVELWILD2_Q2_100_100<tab>「<var 28 ((InstanceContent)) E80204 /var>」を 「GREED限定」で開始しますか？
TEXT_BAHAMUTGUIDETRAVELWILD2_Q2_101_100<tab>「<var 28 ((InstanceContent)) E80204 /var>」を 「マスタールート」で開始しますか？
TEXT_BAHAMUTGUIDETRAVELWILD2_A2_000_101<tab>Yes
TEXT_BAHAMUTGUIDETRAVELWILD2_A2_000_102<tab>No
TEXT_BAHAMUTGUIDETRAVELWILD2_SYSTEM_000_110<tab>You were unable to enter <var 40 ((<var 28 ((InstanceContent)) E80304 /var>)) /var>. Make sure that you and your party meet all the conditions.
TEXT_BAHAMUTGUIDETRAVELWILD2_SYSTEM_000_210<tab>You have recently completed the Final Coil of Bahamut, and cannot enter again until progress is reset.

TEXT_BAHAMUTGUIDETRAVELWILD2_SYSTEM_000_211<tab>Progress is reset every <var 06 1203 /var><var 09 DD ((Sunday)) ((Monday)) ((Tuesday)) ((Wednesday)) ((Thursday)) ((Friday)) ((Saturday)) /var> at <var 08 DB ((<var 09 DB02030405060708090A0B0C0D02030405060708090A0B0C /var>)) 0D /var> <var 08 E0DB0D ((p.m.)) ((a.m.)) /var> (Earth time).
TEXT_BAHAMUTGUIDETRAVELWILD2_Q3_000_300<tab>Awaiting entry confirmation from party members.
TEXT_BAHAMUTGUIDETRAVELWILD2_A3_000_301<tab>Cancel
TEXT_BAHAMUTGUIDETRAVELWILD2_A3_000_340<tab>このコンテンツを攻略済みのメンバーが、<var 20 E803 /var>名存在するため、宝箱の出現数は「<var 20 E804 /var>個」となります。 「<var 28 ((InstanceContent)) E80204 /var>」を開始しますか？

TEXT_BAHAMUTGUIDETRAVELWILD2_A3_000_350<tab><var 08 E4E80302 ((One member)) ((<var 2B ((<var 08 E803 ((<var 08 E2E8030B ((<var 09 E803 ((one)) ((two)) ((three)) ((four)) ((five)) ((six)) ((seven)) ((eight)) ((nine)) ((ten)) /var>)) ((<var 20 E803 /var>)) /var>)) ((<var 20 E803 /var>)) /var>)) /var> members)) /var> of your party <var 08 E4E80302 ((has)) ((have)) /var> already progressed beyond <var 40 ((<var 28 ((InstanceContent)) E80204 /var>)) /var>. As a result, <var 08 E4E80402 ((<var 08 E804 ((<var 08 E2E8040B ((<var 09 E804 ((one)) ((two)) ((three)) ((four)) ((five)) ((six)) ((seven)) ((eight)) ((nine)) ((ten)) /var>)) ((<var 20 E804 /var>)) /var>)) ((<var 20 E804 /var>)) /var> treasure coffer)) ((<var 08 E804 ((<var 08 E2E8040B ((<var 09 E804 ((one)) ((two)) ((three)) ((four)) ((five)) ((six)) ((seven)) ((eight)) ((nine)) ((ten)) /var>)) ((<var 20 E804 /var>)) /var>)) ((<var 20 E804 /var>)) /var> treasure coffers)) /var> will pop upon completion. Do you wish to proceed?
TEXT_BAHAMUTGUIDETRAVELWILD2_A3_100_350<tab>このコンテンツを攻略済みのメンバーが、<var 20 E803 /var>名存在するため、宝箱の出現数は「<var 20 E804 /var>個」となります。 「<var 28 ((InstanceContent)) E80204 /var>」を 「GREED限定」で開始しますか？
TEXT_BAHAMUTGUIDETRAVELWILD2_A3_101_350<tab>このコンテンツを攻略済みのメンバーが、<var 20 E803 /var>名存在するため、宝箱の出現数は「<var 20 E804 /var>個」となります。 「<var 28 ((InstanceContent)) E80204 /var>」を 「マスタールート」で開始しますか？
